<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3306</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Going beyond the Unseen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehen über Unseen hinaus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aller au delà de l'invisible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ir além do despercebido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Andando oltre il unseen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρβαση τον απαρατήρητο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ir más allá del no visto</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG , discusses reading comprehension,how students learn to read, and the 10 commandments of effective learning.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">effective learning.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel, der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint, behandelt Leseerfassen, wie Kursteilnehmer erlernen zu 
lesen, und die 10 Gebote des wirkungsvollen Lernens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, discute la compréhension de lecture, comment les 
étudiants apprennent à lire, et les 10 commandements de l'étude 
pertinente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, discute a compreensão da leitura, como os 
estudantes aprendem ler, e os 10 commandments da aprendizagem eficaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo che è publicato nel PANNO dello 
scomparto di ETNI, discute la comprensione della lettura, come gli 
allievi imparano leggere ed i 10 ordini di imparare efficace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών 
ETNI, συζητά την κατανόηση ανάγνωσης, πώς οι σπουδαστές 
μαθαίνουν να διαβάζουν, και οι 10 εντολές της αποτελεσματικής 
εκμάθησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, discute la comprensión de la lectura, cómo 
los estudiantes aprenden leer, y los 10 mandamientos de aprender 
eficaz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wirkungsvolles Lernen.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étude pertinente.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aprendizagem eficaz.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">imparare efficace.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποτελεσματικός.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el aprender eficaz.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
